metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14588 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-624. A NULL pointer dereference can occur in AP4_DataBuffer::SetData in Core/Ap4DataBuffer.cpp.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
